text: Drepanodontus tatyanae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the Scotia Sea, South Atlantic. ==References== * Harasewych M.G. & Kantor Y.I. 2004. The deep-sea Buccinoidea (Gastropoda: Neogastropoda) of the Scotia Sea and adjacent abyssal plains and trenches. The Nautilus 118(1): 1-42 * Bouchet, P.; Fontaine, B. (2009). List of new marine species described between 2002-2006. Census of Marine Life ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Gastropods described in 2004
title: Drepanodontus tatyanae
